How to Measure for a Suit

  1. Chest: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape measure horizontal.
  2. Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, typically just above your belly button.
  3. Sleeve: Measure from the shoulder seam to just past your wrist bone.
  4. Inseam: Measure from the crotch to the bottom of your ankle.

Note: These measurements are general guidelines. For the best fit, we recommend getting measured by a professional tailor.
